response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package to ensure you have the best experience with our product. I hope we can make this transaction happen, and I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
